CustomField.description: displays the notice period date of cancellation (date to which cancellations should be entered latest, after this date the contract will be renewed)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: substracts the value given in the "cancellation period field" from the "subscription end date field". Please be aware that actual date can be different, if a deviating notice period is not properly set in the "Cancellation period field.
CustomField.label: End of cancellation period
